danger.title: Danger Zone
danger.description: This action is irreversible. Deleting your account will remove all your data.
danger.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
danger.success: Your account has been successfully deleted.
danger.error: There was an error deleting your account. Please try again later.

login.title: Administrator Login
login.fill_in_both_username_and_password: Please fill in both username and password

stats.exportTitle: Export statistics and history to PDF

submit.title: Submit your mushroom inquiry
submit.referenceHint: Use this code to find your request later:
submit.thankYouHint: You will receive a response as soon as an expert has reviewed your photo.

steps.title: Place all mushrooms numbered on a sheet and take photos with good lighting.
steps.hint: Tip: Use daylight and place the mushrooms on a light background.

steps.title: Submit and remember the reference code provided.
steps.hint: The code is used to retrieve the result later.

steps.title: Come back in a day or two and check the answer.
steps.hint: You can use the reference code to log in.

home.description: Not sure if you've picked liberty caps? Submit a free and anonymous request here:

membership.title: Become a Member ‚Äì Support Soppidentifikasjon.no!
membership.intro: Would you like to help keep Soppidentifikasjon.no running and assist others with safe mushroom picking? As a member, you support our work in covering operational costs and compensating our mushroom experts.
membership.why1: üå± Support the platform: Help maintain the website and keep our identification service free.
membership.why2: üçÑ Learn about mushrooms: Gain access to exclusive content on mushroom identification, edible species, and lookalikes.
membership.why3: üßê Become an expert: Members can apply to join our team of mushroom experts and assist others in safe identification.
membership.type1: üíõ Supporter: Contribute financially and get access to exclusive member content.
membership.type2: üî¨ Expert Member: For those with experience and knowledge, willing to identify mushrooms for our users.
membership.closing: Together, we make mushroom identification safer for everyone! Become a member today and support our mission.

support.title: Need help?
support.intro: Here you‚Äôll find answers to common questions and how to contact us.

faq1.question: How does the mushroom identification service work?
faq1.answer: You upload photos and receive a response within 1‚Äì2 days.

faq2.question: How do I use my reference code?
faq2.rest: and enter the code you received.

faq3.question: Can I request a new evaluation?
faq3.answer: Yes, upload new photos and submit a new request.
